26#include <sys/cdefs.h>
27__KERNEL_RCSID(0, "$NetBSD: nouveau_nvkm_engine_dma_user.c,v 1.3 2018/08/27 07:36:07 riastradh Exp $");
28
29#include "user.h"
30
31#include <core/client.h>
32#include <core/gpuobj.h>
33#include <subdev/fb.h>
34#include <subdev/instmem.h>
35
36#include <nvif/class.h>
37#include <nvif/unpack.h>
38
39static int
40nvkm_dmaobj_bind(struct nvkm_object *base, struct nvkm_gpuobj *gpuobj,
41 int align, struct nvkm_gpuobj **pgpuobj)
42{
43 struct nvkm_dmaobj *dmaobj = nvkm_dmaobj(base);
44 return dmaobj->func->bind(dmaobj, gpuobj, align, pgpuobj);
45}
46
47static void *
48nvkm_dmaobj_dtor(struct nvkm_object *base)
49{
50 struct nvkm_dmaobj *dmaobj = nvkm_dmaobj(base);
51#ifdef __NetBSD__
52 if (dmaobj->on_tree) {
53 rb_tree_remove_node(&dmaobj->object.client->dmatree, dmaobj);
54 dmaobj->on_tree = false;
55 }
56#else
57 if (!RB_EMPTY_NODE(&dmaobj->rb))
58 rb_erase(&dmaobj->rb, &dmaobj->object.client->dmaroot);
59#endif
60 return dmaobj;
61}
62
63static const struct nvkm_object_func
64nvkm_dmaobj_func = {
65 .dtor = nvkm_dmaobj_dtor,
66 .bind = nvkm_dmaobj_bind,
67};
68
69int
70nvkm_dmaobj_ctor(const struct nvkm_dmaobj_func *func, struct nvkm_dma *dma,
71 const struct nvkm_oclass *oclass, void **pdata, u32 *psize,
72 struct nvkm_dmaobj *dmaobj)
73{
74 union {
75 struct nv_dma_v0 v0;
76 } *args = *pdata;
77 struct nvkm_device *device = dma->engine.subdev.device;
78 struct nvkm_client *client = oclass->client;
79 struct nvkm_object *parent = oclass->parent;
80 struct nvkm_instmem *instmem = device->imem;
81 struct nvkm_fb *fb = device->fb;
82 void *data = *pdata;
83 u32 size = *psize;
84 int ret;
85
86 nvkm_object_ctor(&nvkm_dmaobj_func, oclass, &dmaobj->object);
87 dmaobj->func = func;
88 dmaobj->dma = dma;
89#ifndef __NetBSD__
90 RB_CLEAR_NODE(&dmaobj->rb);
91#endif
92
93 nvif_ioctl(parent, "create dma size %d\n", *psize);
94 if (nvif_unpack(args->v0, 0, 0, true)) {
95 nvif_ioctl(parent, "create dma vers %d target %d access %d "
96 "start %016"PRIx64" limit %016"PRIx64"\n",
97 args->v0.version, args->v0.target, args->v0.access,
98 args->v0.start, args->v0.limit);
99 dmaobj->target = args->v0.target;
100 dmaobj->access = args->v0.access;
101 dmaobj->start = args->v0.start;
102 dmaobj->limit = args->v0.limit;
103 } else
104 return ret;
105
106 *pdata = data;
107 *psize = size;
108
109 if (dmaobj->start > dmaobj->limit)
110 return -EINVAL;
111
112 switch (dmaobj->target) {
113 case NV_DMA_V0_TARGET_VM:
114 dmaobj->target = NV_MEM_TARGET_VM;
115 break;
116 case NV_DMA_V0_TARGET_VRAM:
117 if (!client->super) {
118 if (dmaobj->limit >= fb->ram->size - instmem->reserved)
119 return -EACCES;
120 if (device->card_type >= NV_50)
121 return -EACCES;
122 }
123 dmaobj->target = NV_MEM_TARGET_VRAM;
124 break;
125 case NV_DMA_V0_TARGET_PCI:
126 if (!client->super)
127 return -EACCES;
128 dmaobj->target = NV_MEM_TARGET_PCI;
129 break;
130 case NV_DMA_V0_TARGET_PCI_US:
131 case NV_DMA_V0_TARGET_AGP:
132 if (!client->super)
133 return -EACCES;
134 dmaobj->target = NV_MEM_TARGET_PCI_NOSNOOP;
135 break;
136 default:
137 return -EINVAL;
138 }
139
140 switch (dmaobj->access) {
141 case NV_DMA_V0_ACCESS_VM:
142 dmaobj->access = NV_MEM_ACCESS_VM;
143 break;
144 case NV_DMA_V0_ACCESS_RD:
145 dmaobj->access = NV_MEM_ACCESS_RO;
146 break;
147 case NV_DMA_V0_ACCESS_WR:
148 dmaobj->access = NV_MEM_ACCESS_WO;
149 break;
150 case NV_DMA_V0_ACCESS_RDWR:
151 dmaobj->access = NV_MEM_ACCESS_RW;
152 break;
153 default:
154 return -EINVAL;
155 }
156
157 return ret;
158}
